```py
1\. SELECT
2\. FROM
3\. WHERE
4\. GROUP BY
5\. HAVING
6\. ORDER BY
7\. LIMIT
```

```py
1\. FROM
2\. WHERE
3\. GROUP BY
4\. HAVING
5\. SELECT
6\. ORDER BY
7\. LIMIT
```

```py
SELECT 
   city
  ,country
FROM 
  cities
WHERE 
  country = 'New Zealand';
```

```py
SELECT
   city
  ,country
FROM
  cities
WHERE 
  population > 500000;
```

```py
SELECT
   city
  ,country
FROM
  cities
WHERE 
  country = 'New Zealand' 
  AND population > 500000;
```

```py
SELECT 
   country
  ,SUM(popualtion) 
FROM 
  cities
WHERE 
  SUM(popualtion) > 5000000
GROUP BY 
  country;
```

```py
SELECT 
   country
  ,SUM(popualtion) 
FROM 
  cities
GROUP BY 
  country;
```

```py
SELECT 
   country
  ,SUM(population)
FROM 
  cities
GROUP BY 
  country
HAVING 
  SUM(popualtion) > 5000000;
```

```py
SELECT 
   country
  ,SUM(population) AS total_pop
FROM 
  cities
GROUP BY 
  country
HAVING 
  total_pop > 5000000;
```

```py
SELECT 
   country
  ,SUM(population) AS total_pop
FROM 
  cities
GROUP BY 
  country
ORDER BY
  total_pop;
```

```py
SELECT 
   country
  ,SUM(population) AS total_pop
FROM 
  cities
GROUP BY 
  country
ORDER BY
  total_pop DESC;
```

```py
SELECT 
   city
  ,country
  ,population AS city_pop
FROM 
  cities
ORDER BY
  city_pop DESC
LIMIT
  3;
```
